items.summary: Update the global Tailwind/CSS theme tokens to use a darker copper palette across the entire app (all routes/pages), by adjusting the copper-related CSS variables in `frontend/src/index.css` for both `:root` (light theme) and `.dark` (dark theme). Ensure the darker copper is reflected in primary/accent/secondary, borders/rings, and any other copper-tinted tokens so that components using `bg-primary`, `text-primary`, `border-primary/*`, gradients, and muted/accent backgrounds all shift consistently without per-page edits.

Update any Tailwind theme extensions that hardcode the old copper color so they match the new darker copper palette (e.g., the `shadow-copper` definition in `frontend/tailwind.config.js`) to keep shadows/embellishments aligned with the updated theme.
